name: aggregator-multisplit
description: A project for multi-split token swaps using intermediate tokens to reduce slippage.

scripts.deploy: ENV_FILE=production hardhat --config hardhat.config.js run scripts/deploy.js --network harmony
scripts.deploy:testnet: ENV_FILE=dev hardhat --config hardhat.config.js run scripts/deploy.js --network harmonyTestnet
scripts.verify:testnet: ENV_FILE=dev hardhat --config hardhat.config.js run scripts/verify.js --network harmonyTestnet
scripts.simulate: ENV_FILE=production hardhat --config hardhat.config.js run scripts/simulate.js --network harmony
scripts.simulate:testnet: ENV_FILE=dev hardhat --config hardhat.config.js run scripts/simulate.js --network harmonyTestnet
scripts.clean: rimraf cache artifacts || rm -rf cache artifacts
